fields.description: The name of a Specialty.  The name combined with the code must be unique.
An alphanumeric identifier for the Specialty.  The code combined with the name must be unique.
When true, prevents the specialty from being used during ad-hoc certification creation.
Indicates if the Specialty is inactive.  If inactive, it cannot be added to a certification.
A URL associated with the Specialty
Provides references to each Subspecialty associated with the Specialty.
Allows users to select Specialties based on Name.
Allows users to select Specialties based on Code.
Allows users to select Specialties based on Active/Inactive status.

Restrict_Specialty_Usage.description: When true, prevents the specialty from being used during ad-hoc certification creation.

Specialty_Code.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the Specialty.  The code combined with the name must be unique.

Specialty_Code_Prompt.description: Allows users to select Specialties based on Code.

Specialty_Inactive.description: Indicates if the Specialty is inactive.  If inactive, it cannot be added to a certification.

Specialty_Inactive_Prompt.description: Allows users to select Specialties based on Active/Inactive status.

Specialty_Name.description: The name of a Specialty.  The name combined with the code must be unique.

Specialty_Name_Prompt.description: Allows users to select Specialties based on Name.

Specialty_URL.description: A URL associated with the Specialty

Subspecialty_Reference.description: Provides references to each Subspecialty associated with the Specialty.
